location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Jacob, Jacobabad to Lewis Pelly

physicalDescription.extent: The contents of the letter have been written vertically from folios 146 to 149 and then the paper has been turned horizontally and continued firstly on folio 149v and finally on folio 148.

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Pelly's decision to stay in England; the type and amount of work that Jacob is currently undertaking; the contents of Jacob's 'progress letters'; and the situation in Herat.
